entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `JsonSerializer.Deserialize<TValue>(JsonNode?)` extensions could be improved #84234
  • LoggerMessageAttribute extension to support Exception messages #84233
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Expose WASM File System API's in dotnet.js #84218
  • Deduction double values does give incorrect value. #84227
  • How to get the byte pointer / a byte span to the data of an boxed object? #84209

PullRequests

Created

  • Eliminate bound checks for "arr[index % arr.Length]" #84231
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update System.CommandLine version #84229
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Add a fastpath to calling mini_init_method_rgctx (). #84226
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add constprop handling for `typeof(T) == typeof(Foo)` #84224
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Change culture-sensitive IndexOf to culture-insensitive #84223
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code #84197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refine BBF_GC_SAFE_POINT handling in reachability computation #84215
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Eliminate bound checks for "arr[arr.Length - cns]" #84213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve Guid.Parse for input without whitespaces #84210
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • added explanation to more GC data structures #84162
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2149143 #84102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on WASM. #82981
  • Delete `GTF_BLK_VOLATILE` and `GTF_BLK_UNALIGNED` #84217
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_OBJ` #84221
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Split Rank1 MdArray allocation into a separate helper #84205
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set better DfsBlockEntry stack initial capacity #84186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
